column1: Advanced Electrical and Electronic Engineering with Management - MSc/PGDip

The course is designed to give you the tools to work towards a career in a wide variety of fields in the engineering and technical industries. The combination of advanced technical engineering skills and knowledge of management theory and practice will equip you with the knowledge and skills required to secure leadership roles in global engineering industries.To boost your electrical and electronic engineering prospects, it pays to look beyond the basics. This degree combines advanced-level learning with management theory and practice â€“ everything you need to make a real impact out in the field.
FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
1-2 years full time, 2 years part time available
